stories.text: When I was in middle school circa 2010-2011 and Facebook was just coming out I created an account with an embarrassing profile picture and posts/likes. Now I’ve forgot the password and it’s the #1 result on Google when you search my name. I’ve tried all ways to recover the account, but the only option is to enter a password. It’s ruining my professional life and taking a major toll on my mental health. Is there any way to get it taken down or should I begin the process of changing my legal name? If I do so will I be able to have it updated on my ID / Birth Certificate / SSN card?
stories.title: Ask HN: Created embarrassing FB acc 10 years ago when underage and forgot pass

stories.text: The more I see of SPACs, the more it looks like insiders playing market games. Why do SPACs exist vs. the typical way that companies go public? Are SPACs legit or some form of market game?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why do SPACs seem so shady? Are they market scams?
